targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("ifInDiscards"), 1s) AS "Drop:In", non_negative_derivative(last("ifOutDiscards"), 1s) AS "Drop:Out", non_negative_derivative(last("ifInErrors"), 1s) AS "Error:In", non_negative_derivative(last("ifOutErrors"), 1s) AS "Error:Out", non_negative_derivative(last("ifInUnknownProtos"), 1s) AS "Unkwn:In" FROM "ifTable" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "ifOperStatus" = 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "ifDescr" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("allReqIn"), 1m) AS "GetReq:In", non_negative_derivative(mean("allReqOut"), 1m) AS "GetReq:Out" FROM ( SELECT "snmpInGetRequests"+"snmpInGetNexts" AS "allReqIn", "snmpOutGetRequests"+"snmpOutGetNexts" AS "allReqOut" FROM "snmp.UAP" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.label: UniFi AP:
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp.UAP" WITH KEY = "agent_host"

list.label: Radio
list.name: radio
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "unifiVapTable" WITH KEY = "unifiVapRadio" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/

list.label: vAP:
list.name: vap
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "unifiVapTable" WITH KEY = "unifiVapName" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/

list.label: Interface:
list.name: intf
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "unifiIfTable" WITH KEY = "unifiIfName" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host$/
